presentation.title: Hello, my name is Santiago Casanova
presentation.description: I'm a Frontend developer in constant learning. Passionate about web development and technology.

certifications.title: Certifications

work.description: Had the opportunity to work in different projects as Junior Frontend Developer applying the Scrum methodology, using Vue.js as framework and Git as version controller among many other tools.

practice.title: Practices
practice.description: I was inspired by the famous ecommerce Amazon to perform a challenging internship, with payment gateway, user authentication, shopping cart and other features that would allow me to test my knowledge.
